short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes all tabs except the current one.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop RAM use in all tabs except the current one (Only RAM is freed up, the tabs themselves remain in the panel).
CAUTENTION - any unsaved data in else tabs will loose!

Ver. 1.1 In option you can choose to turn on/off close pinned tabs also.
